context.p: From the Go to marketplace page, you can directly access a marketplace.

step.cmd: From the Marketplace list, select the marketplace you want to access.

info.p: The list contains all marketplaces to which you have been granted access by or for which you are registered as the marketplace owner.

step.cmd: To access the selected marketplace, click Go To.

result.p: The marketplace is displayed and you are automatically logged in. Depending on your browser settings, the marketplace is displayed in your current tab, a new tab, or a new browser window.
